name: Glory of the Icecrown Raider (10 player)

strategy.title: Overview
steps: Complete all raid achievements in Icecrown Citadel on 10-player
Several achievements require precise execution even at max level

strategy.title: Tricky Achievements
steps: Been Waiting a Long Time for This: Let Lich King stack Necrotic Plague to 30 - takes patience
All You Can Eat: Keep Sindragosa's Mystic Buffet below 5 stacks - hide behind ice tombs
Portal Jockey: Enter every portal during Valithria Dreamwalker - need a healer
Neck-Deep in Vile: Kill 4 Vile Spirits in 5 seconds on Lich King

strategy.title: Tips
steps: Bring a healer friend for Valithria - she must be healed to full
For Lich King achievements, control your DPS to extend the fight
Full Heroic clear also required for the meta
